Package classifierPackage

Class Bayes

java.lang.Object
classifierPackage.Bayes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Classifier
public class Bayes
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier
Implementation of a tree augmented naive Bayes classifier (TAN).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Bayes​(java.lang.String train_file, java.lang.String test_file, java.lang.String score, boolean debug)
    Constructs a Bayes classifier.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void predict()
    Predicts the outcome with the model built by the predict method for a given test file.
    It also keeps track of the time spent predicting the results.
    java.lang.String[] results()
    Returns the results predicted in predict as an array of Strings.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a String containing the structure of the originated tree, the time spent building the classifier, the predicted results for the test dataset provided and the time spent performing the prediction.
    void train()
    Reads the contents of the train file and trains the classifier by building a supporting graph followed by a directed tree.
    It computes the time spent building the classifier.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Bayes

      public Bayes​(java.lang.String train_file, java.lang.String test_file, java.lang.String score, boolean debug)
      Constructs a Bayes classifier.
      Parameters:
      train_file - String with the name of the file containing the training dataset.
      test_file - String with the name of the file containing the test dataset.
      score - String with the type of score to be used for the computation of the nodes parameters.
      debug - Allows to perform debug or not.

  • Method Details

    • train

      public void train()
      Reads the contents of the train file and trains the classifier by building a supporting graph followed by a directed tree.
      It computes the time spent building the classifier. It is able to handle classes not in numeric form by performing a translation.
      Specified by:
      train in interface Classifier

    • predict

      public void predict()
      Predicts the outcome with the model built by the predict method for a given test file.
      It also keeps track of the time spent predicting the results.
      Specified by:
      predict in interface Classifier

    • results

      public java.lang.String[] results()
      Returns the results predicted in predict as an array of Strings.
      Specified by:
      results in interface Classifier
      Returns:
      Array of strings with the predicted values.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String containing the structure of the originated tree, the time spent building the classifier, the predicted results for the test dataset provided and the time spent performing the prediction.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
